com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.animation

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.animation.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends Object
    Animation.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation()
      Creates a new Animation with initial capacity for 10 frames and loop mode enabled by default.
      Animation(boolean loopMode)
      Creates a new Animation with initial capacity for 10 frames by default.
      Animation(int initialCapacity, boolean loopMode)
      Creates a new Animation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAnimationStateListener(AnimationStateListener listener)
      Registers an AnimationStateListener in this Animation.
      void addFrame(AnimationFrame frame)
      Adds a frame to this Animation.
      void clear()
      Removes all the AnimationFrames of this Animation and resets it.
      AnimationFrame getCurrentFrame()
      Returns the current frame of this Animation.
      ArrayList<AnimationFrame> getFrames()
      Returns all the AnimationFrames of this Animation.
      boolean isFinished()
      Returns true if this Animation is finished.
      boolean isLoopModeEnabled()
      Returns true if the loop mode is enabled.
      boolean isPaused()
      Returns true if this Animation is paused.
      boolean isRunning()
      Returns true if this Animation is running, and false if it is paused or finished.
      void pause()
      Pauses this Animation if it has not finished (if loop mode is enabled, the Animation is never considered finished).
      boolean removeAnimationStateListener(AnimationStateListener listener)
      Removes the specified AnimationStateListener from the list of listeners of this animation.
      void reset()
      Resets the state of this Animation.
      void resume()
      Resumed this Animation if it was paused.
      void setLoopModeEnabled(boolean loopMode)
      Enables or disables the loop mode.
      AnimationFrame update(float delta)
      Updates this Animation and returns the current AnimationFrame.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation()
        Creates a new Animation with initial capacity for 10 frames and loop mode enabled by default.

      • Animation

        public Animation(boolean loopMode)
        Creates a new Animation with initial capacity for 10 frames by default.
        Parameters:
        loopMode - If enabled, the animation will loop forever, otherwise, it will not loop.

      • Animation

        public Animation(int initialCapacity,
         boolean loopMode)
        Creates a new Animation.
        Parameters:
        initialCapacity - Number of frames that can be added before resizing the array of frames.
        loopMode - If true, the animation will loop, otherwise it won't.

    • Method Detail

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(AnimationFrame frame)
        Adds a frame to this Animation.
        Parameters:
        frame - AnimationFrame to be added.

      • getFrames

        public ArrayList<AnimationFrame> getFrames()
        Returns all the AnimationFrames of this Animation.
        Returns:
        AnimationFrames

      • getCurrentFrame

        public AnimationFrame getCurrentFrame()
        Returns the current frame of this Animation.
        Returns:
        AnimationFrame or null if this Animation does not contain any frame.

      • update

        public AnimationFrame update(float delta)
        Updates this Animation and returns the current AnimationFrame.
        Parameters:
        delta - Elapsed time since the last update.
        Returns:
        AnimationFrame or null if this Animation does not contain any frame.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the state of this Animation. The list of AnimationFrames will not be reset.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the AnimationFrames of this Animation and resets it.

      • isLoopModeEnabled

        public boolean isLoopModeEnabled()
        Returns true if the loop mode is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the loop mode is enabled, false otherwise

      • setLoopModeEnabled

        public void setLoopModeEnabled(boolean loopMode)
        Enables or disables the loop mode.
        Parameters:
        loopMode - true to enable the loop mode, false to disable it.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pauses this Animation if it has not finished (if loop mode is enabled, the Animation is never considered finished).

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumed this Animation if it was paused.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns true if this Animation is running, and false if it is paused or finished.
        Returns:
        true if this Animation is running, false otherwise

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Returns true if this Animation is paused.
        Returns:
        true if this Animation is paused, false otherwise

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns true if this Animation is finished.
        If loop mode is enabled, an Animation is never considered finished.
        Returns:
        true if this Animation is finished, false otherwise

      • addAnimationStateListener

        public void addAnimationStateListener(AnimationStateListener listener)
        Registers an AnimationStateListener in this Animation.
        Parameters:
        listener - AnimationStateListener

      • removeAnimationStateListener

        public boolean removeAnimationStateListener(AnimationStateListener listener)
        Removes the specified AnimationStateListener from the list of listeners of this animation.
        Parameters:
        listener - AnimationStateListener
        Returns:
        true if the specified listener was removed, false otherwise
